import Mathlib

open Filter

theorem riemann_integrable_on_of_lim_of_integrable_on_subintervals
  {a b : ‚Ñù} {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
  (hbounded : BoundedOn f (Icc a b))
  (hab : a < b)
  (a_n b_n : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  (h_inside : ‚àÄ n, a < a_n n ‚àß a_n n < b_n n ‚àß b_n n < b)
  (ha : Tendsto a_n atTop (ùìù a))
  (hb : Tendsto b_n atTop (ùìù b))
  (hints : ‚àÄ n, IsRiemannIntegrableOn f (Icc (a_n n) (b_n n))) :
  IsRiemannIntegrableOn f (Icc a b) ‚àß
  Tendsto (fun n => ‚à´ x in a_n n..b_n n, f x) atTop (ùìù (‚à´ x in a..b, f x)) := by sorry
